data.name: errBusyFix
data.value: The scanner is busy working on another command. Try again in a little bit.

data.name: errCantDeleteFile
data.value: We were unable to delete the following file. It may be open in another program. Please close any applications that are using these files, and then close and reopen the session before scanning.

data.name: errClosedSessionFix
data.value: This session has been closed, and will not accept attempts to scan. Drain all images to free the scanner.

data.name: errCoverOpenFix
data.value: A cover or an interlock on the scanner is not properly secured. Please check the scanner, and try again.

data.name: errDottedNotation
data.value: The dotted notation, indicated above, points to the value that triggered the failure condition.

data.name: errDoubleFeedFix
data.value: The scanner was requested or defaulted to check for instances where two or more sheets pass through the automatic document feeder. Check the paper to see if any are stuck together, and try again.

data.name: errErrorStarting
data.value: Error starting. Try uninstalling and reinstalling this software.

data.name: errFoldedCornerFix
data.value: The scanner was asked to detect problems with the paper being scanned, such as folded corners. Please check the paper, and try again.

data.name: errInvalidCapturingOptionsFix
data.value: The scanner has rejected this task. This only happens when the task requires specific capabilities from the scanner. Either select a task that this scanner will accept, or change to a scanner that supports the features required by the current task.

data.name: errInvalidImageBlockNumberFix
data.value: The scanner was asked for image data that it can't provide. Close this session and start a new one, if you want to continue.

data.name: errInvalidSessionIdFix
data.value: Communication was lost or compromised. Make sure this session is closed, and try to create a new session.

data.name: errJsonErrorIndexFix
data.value: We have a response from the scanner, but it can't be parsed due to an error in its construction. The index shows where we ran into trouble. What follows is the raw data we received.

data.name: errMisfeedFix
data.value: A misfeed has occurred with the scanner. This is a somewhat generic error, and could include communication errors. Please resolve the problem, and try again.

data.name: errMissingErrorCodeFix
data.value: When an error occurs we expect to receive a code. The response does not have this code, so we can't tell what error happened What follows is the raw data we received.

data.name: errNewSessionNotAllowedFix
data.value: The scanner may be in use by another user. Or it may be turned off or disconnected. Check to to see which it is, and then retry. If the problem persists, try turning the scanner off, wait a bit, and turn it back on. If you're using the TWAIN Bridge try exiting from it and restarting it.

data.name: errNoMediaFix
data.value: There was no paper for the scanner to capture. Please check that the paper is properly loaded, and try again.

data.name: errNotCapturingFix
data.value: This session is not capturing, and will not accept attempts to transfer images. Close this session and start a new one, if you want to continue.

data.name: errNotReadyFix
data.value: This session is not ready, and will not accept attempts to negotiate tasks. Close this session and start a new one, if you want to continue.

data.name: errNoTwainDriversInstalled
data.value: There are no TWAIN drivers installed on this system.

data.name: errNoTwainScanners
data.value: There are no TWAIN Direct scanners available at this time.

data.name: errPaperJamFix
data.value: A paper jam has been reported. Please clear the jam and try again.

data.name: errSessionAborted
data.value: Your scanner session has aborted. Check your scanner to make sure it's on and connected to the network.

data.name: errSessionTimeout
data.value: Your scanner session has timed out due to lack of activity.

data.name: errTaskFailed
data.value: This error is the result of the task specifying an exception of 'fail' somewhere within it. The scanner triggered this when it was unable to set a required value. There are two possible solutions: find a scanner that supports the feature required by the task, or use a different task.

data.name: errTimeoutFix
data.value: The scanner did not respond in a timely fashion. Check that the scanner is still on, and that there is a good connection to the network.

data.name: errTimeoutWakeupFix
data.value: The scanner did not respond in a timely fashion. Check that the scanner is still on, and that there is a good connection to the network. Since this happened for 'createSession' it's possible the scanner was in a sleep state, and took too long to wake up. Trying a second time may be successful.

data.name: errUnknownCheckLogs
data.value: Unknown error, please checks the logs for more information.

data.name: errUnrecognizedErrorCodeFix
data.value: We don't have any advice to offer for this error, it may be custom to the scanner, or this application may not be recent enough to know about it. What follows is the raw data we received.

data.name: strButtonRegisterEllipsis
data.comment: Register a new scanner in the cloud...

data.name: strButtonUnregisterEllipsis
data.comment: Unregister (remove) a scanner from the cloud...

data.name: strLabelSelectImageDestination
data.value: Sélectionnez le dossier image de destination:

data.name: errNoCloudManager
data.value: Sorry, we do not have a cloud manager for this cloud.
